1.0.name: wordpress/ip2currency-converter
1.0.description:
IP2Currency Converter provides you a nice and ready-to-use widget to easily add the currency exchange rate function into your website. Below are the features: - Support up to 58 commonly used currencies - Daily updated exchange rate - Customizable style, e.g, the color and skin.

Note: Your will need to register a free API key to gain access as the convertion results are calculated on IP2Currency server.
